text:
EMORY AIR FREIGHT CORPORATION
4616 W. 55th Street
Chicago 32, Illinois
December 4, 1952
NAEB Network
119 Gregory Hall
Urbana, Illinois
Gentlemen:
Our air freight statement #CG-9-5947 for $122.59 was sent to you
on October 6, 1952. When it remained unpaid on November 12, 1952,
we again sent you a copy of the statement and freight bill #NY-5157. Neither
has been acknowledged nor acted upon, according to our records, nor has any
reason for non-payment been offered.
We are required by federal regulations to collect air freight charges due
us within seven days after submission of bills. Since our bill to you is
long overdue, we must request immediate payment of our invoice, another copy of
which is enclosed.
Very truly yours.
8 E. L. Hammergren, Cashier
